data.title: Dino De Laurentiis, Producer of Film Spectacles, Dies at 91
data.meta_description: Dino De Laurentiis, the son of Italian pasta makers who became a prolific movie producer of blockbuster hits such as “Serpico,” expensive duds such as “Dune” and sweeping epics including “War and Peace,” has died. He was 91.
data.text:
Dino De Laurentiis, the son of Italian pasta makers who became a prolific movie producer of blockbuster hits such as “Serpico,” expensive duds such as “Dune” and sweeping epics including “War and Peace,” has died. He was 91.

He died in Los Angeles, his longtime adopted home, Agence France-Presse reported, citing his family. He lived in Beverly Hills with his third wife, Martha. The news agency said his nephew, producer Aurelio De Laurentiis, confirmed his uncle’s death to reporters in Rome.
